content:
Convert Class

Definition

Converts data from one type to another. This is a utility class.

In this Article

public sealed class Convert
Inheritance
Object
Convert

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
ToString()

Constructors

Convert()

Initializes a new instance of the Convert class.

public Convert ();

Methods

CheckIfDoubleIsInteger(Double)

Determines whether a Double variable contains an integer value.

public static double CheckIfDoubleIsInteger (double d);
Parameters
d
Double

The Double to test.

Returns
Double

If d contains an integer value, d is returned. If not, an exception is thrown.

CheckIfSingleIsInteger(Single)

Determines whether a Single variable contains an integer value.

public static float CheckIfSingleIsInteger (float s);
Parameters
s
Single

The Single to test.

Returns
Single

If s contains an integer value, s is returned. If not, an exception is thrown.

Coerce(Object, Object)

Converts the specified value to the specified type.

public static object Coerce (object value, object type);
Parameters
value
Object

The value to convert to a new type.

type
Object

The type to convert value to.

Returns
Object

value converted to type.

Remarks

This method does not allow conversions that cause a loss of information, such as converting 1.5 to an integer.

Coerce2(Object, TypeCode, Boolean)

Converts the specified value to the specified TypeCode, optionally allowing data loss.

public static object Coerce2 (object value, TypeCode target, bool truncationPermitted);
Parameters
value
Object

The value to convert to a new type.

target
TypeCode

The type to convert value to.

truncationPermitted
Boolean

true to allow data loss; otherwise, false.

Returns
Object

value converted to the target type.

CoerceT(Object, Type, Boolean)

Converts the specified value to the specified Type, optionally allowing data loss.

public static object CoerceT (object value, Type t, bool explicitOK);
Parameters
value
Object

The value to convert to a new type.

t
Type

The type to convert value to.

explicitOK
Boolean

true to allow data loss; otherwise, false.

Returns
Object

value converted to the type t.

IsBadIndex(AST)

Determines whether a variable contains an array index value.

public static bool IsBadIndex (Microsoft.JScript.AST ast);
Parameters
ast
AST

The variable to test.

Returns
Boolean

true if ast contains an array index value; otherwise, false.

ThrowTypeMismatch(Object)

Throws a JScriptException exception in all cases.

public static void ThrowTypeMismatch (object val);
Parameters
val
Object

The source code that caused the exception.

ToBoolean(Double)

Converts the specified Double to a Boolean.

public static bool ToBoolean (double d);
Parameters
d
Double

The value to convert.

Returns
Boolean

false if d is 0; otherwise, true.

ToBoolean(Object)

Converts the specified Object to a Boolean.

public static bool ToBoolean (object value);
Parameters
value
Object

The value to convert.

Returns
Boolean

value converted to a Boolean.

ToBoolean(Object, Boolean)

Converts the specified Object value to a Boolean structure, optionally allowing data loss.

public static bool ToBoolean (object value, bool explicitConversion);
Parameters
value
Object

The value to convert.

explicitConversion
Boolean

true to allow data loss; otherwise, false.

Returns
Boolean

value converted to a Boolean.

ToForInObject(Object, VsaEngine)

Converts the specified value to an Object that represents a collection of AST objects.

Parameters
value
Object

The value to convert.

engine
VsaEngine

A reference to the scripting engine.

value converted to an Object.

Converts the specified value to an Int32.

public static int ToInt32 (object value);
Parameters
value
Object

The value to convert.

Returns
Int32

value converted to an Int32.

ToNativeArray(Object, RuntimeTypeHandle)

Converts the specified ArrayObject to a typed Array.

public static object ToNativeArray (object value, RuntimeTypeHandle handle);
Parameters
value
Object

The ArrayObject to convert.

handle
RuntimeTypeHandle

The type of the elements in the array.

Returns
Object

value converted to an Array if this is possible; otherwise, value.

Converts the specified Object to a Double.

value
Object

The value to convert.

value converted to a Double.

str
String

The value to convert.

Returns

str converted to a Double.

Converts the specified value to an Object. Throws an error if it cannot perform the conversion.
